message: Let's start fair. I propose we split it 60/40. What do you think?
Your offer was a good starting point, but with the inflation, I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  Think about it - we both lose if we wait too long!
Let's cut our losses and split it evenly. We both lose more money with each round, so a 50/50 split is the best outcome now.
